> **참고**: 이 페이지는 아직 한국어로 번역되지 않았습니다. 아래는 영어 원문입니다.

A Fragment which represents a constructor.

## Extends

- [`Fragment`](/ko/sdk/content/classes/Fragment)

## Properties

| Property | Modifier | Type | Description | Inherited from |
| :------ | :------ | :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `gas` | `readonly` | `null` \| `bigint` | The recommended gas limit for deployment or `null`. | - |
| `inputs` | `readonly` | readonly [`ParamType`](/ko/sdk/content/classes/ParamType)[] | The inputs for the fragment. | [`Fragment`](/ko/sdk/content/classes/Fragment).`inputs` |
| `payable` | `readonly` | `boolean` | Whether the constructor can receive an endowment. | - |
| `type` | `readonly` | [`FragmentType`](/ko/sdk/content/type-aliases/FragmentType) | The type of the fragment. | [`Fragment`](/ko/sdk/content/classes/Fragment).`type` |

### isFragment()

```ts
static isFragment(value): value is ConstructorFragment
```
